meanings.sent1: She received bounties for her hard work.
meanings.sent2: The company offers bounties for successful referrals.
meanings.sent3: The bounties for finding the missing cat were claimed by the young detective.
meanings.sent4: In the game, players collect bounties to level up their characters.
meanings.sent5: The bounties for returning lost items made the community come together.

meanings.sent1: His bounties towards the homeless shelter were greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The queen was known for her bounties towards the less fortunate.
meanings.sent3: The bounties of the kind stranger warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: Her bounties of love and care knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The bounties of the philanthropist changed many lives for the better.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with bounties of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The land was rich in bounties of crops and fruits.
meanings.sent3: The bounties of the buffet left everyone feeling satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a treasure trove of bounties waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The ocean offered bounties of fish for the fishermen to catch.
